H5880.def: = town, also known as {L:Kadesh<SDBH:קָדֵשׁ>}, {L:Kedesh<SDBH:קֶדֶשׁ>}, and {L:Kadesh Barnea<SDBH:קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ>}; ◄ located in the Wilderness of {L:Zin<SDBH:צִן>}, in the northern part of {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; it is also the location of the {L:Meribah<SDBH:מְרִיבָה>} spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3540.def: = man; ► king of {L:Elam<SDBH:עֵילָם>}, who launched a campaign into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>} together with four other kings, during the time of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5467.def: = town; ◄ located near {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; ► town where {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} settled, when he separated himself from {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; destroyed with {L:Gomorrah<SDBH:עֲמֹרָה>}

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H7740.def: = valley, also called  עֵמֶק הַמֶּלֶךְ "King's Valley"; ◄ exact location unknown

H4442.def: = man; ► king of {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>}, who blessed {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>} when he returned from defeating the kings of the East

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5945.def: = state of being in an elevated position

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H87.def: = man, also known as {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5945.def: = state of being in an elevated position

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4042.def: = action by which humans transfer possession of something to someone else

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4643.def: = state in which an entity is one out of ten equal parts

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2339.def: = spun out filament, sometimes dyed scarlet; ◄ of cotton, flax, wool, or another material; ► used as strands for making ropes or for measuring the circumference of objects; ≈ regarded as weak and insignificant

H5275.def: = a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either  open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H2506.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6063.def: = man; ◄ {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>}; brother of {L:Mamre<SDBH:מַמְרֵא>} and {L:Eshkol<SDBH:אֶשְׁכֹּול>}; ► ally of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}

H812.def: = group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem

H4471.def: = man; ◄ {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>}; brother of {L:Eshkol<SDBH:אֶשְׁכֹּול>} and {L:Aner<SDBH:עָנֵר>}; ► ally of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}
